        Parameters:

        value - Value for the header. If null, the header will be removed.

      • hasUserAgent

        public boolean hasUserAgent(@NonNull
                            AbstractClient.LibraryVersion userAgent)

        Test whether a user agent is declared.

        Parameters:
        userAgent - The user agent to look for.
        Returns:
        true if it is declared on this client, false otherwise.
